grade_comment:
Grade: 85

Comment: The response demonstrates a good understanding of the significance of the title "Son of Man" in Christian theology, particularly in emphasizing Jesus' dual nature as fully human and fully divine. The discussion about the Messianic implications and Jesus' solidarity with humanity aligns well with a Christian worldview. The only area for improvement would be to delve deeper into the theological implications of Jesus' self-identification as the 'Son of Man' and how it impacts Christian faith more explicitly.
